description:
The Spacer Long Sleeve Shirt is more than just a shirt. It is a versatile layer that can keep you warm and comfortable in various outdoor activities. Whether you are climbing, hiking, or just enjoying nature, the Spacer Shirt has you covered.

  • It’s made from recycled polyester fabric that is soft, durable, and eco-friendly. The fabric has a tridimensional structure that helps reduce microfiber shedding by 50% compared to alternative materials. This means less impact on the environment and less lint on your clothes
  • It also features a Polygiene® anti-odor and anti-bacterial treatment that utilizes silver salt to prevent the growth of odor-causing bacteria and to keep your shirt fresh and hygienic for longer
  • It has snap buttons for quick adjustments, two large pockets to store essential items, and a collar that can be worn up or down
name: La Sportiva Spacer Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
